description: Build Sessions Hub UI with parallel execution - Creator builds System 1 (session creation), Monitor builds System 2 (session monitoring), Integration connects both systems

orchestrator_instructions.role: Coordinate parallel agent execution and verify deliverables

phase_1_kickoff.description: Launch Creator and Monitor agents in parallel

steps.step_1: READ communication.json to identify agent roster
steps.step_3: HANDOFF context files to Agent 1 (Creator) and Agent 2 (Monitor)
steps.step_4: MONITOR agent status updates in communication.json

steps.step_2: VERIFY no forbidden file violations occurred
steps.step_3: VALIDATE component file structure matches design

phase_3_integration.description: Launch Integration agent after Creator + Monitor complete

steps.step_1: VERIFY both Creator and Monitor status = 'complete'

output_template.next_steps: Integration phase ready | Creator pending | Monitor pending

agent_instructions.role: Execute assigned sprint(s) following context file (CLAUDE.md) in your agent subdirectory

phase_1_read_context.description: Read your CLAUDE.md file for workorder-specific instructions

steps.step_1: READ communication.json to find your agent_id and context_file path
steps.step_2: READ your context_file (agent1/CLAUDE.md, agent2/CLAUDE.md, or agent3/CLAUDE.md)

phase_2_execute.description: Execute your assigned sprint(s) following CLAUDE.md instructions

steps.step_1: FOLLOW sprint tasks defined in your CLAUDE.md
steps.step_2: CREATE components in your output_directory only
steps.step_3: AVOID touching any files in forbidden_files list
steps.step_4: UPDATE communication.json status as you progress (not_started → in_progress → complete)

steps.step_1: CREATE deliverables markdown file at your output_file path
steps.step_2: LIST components created, files modified, challenges faced

agent_instructions.output_template:
# {Agent Role} Deliverables

## Components Created
- ComponentName (path)

## Files Modified
- file.tsx (changes)

## Challenges
- Challenge and solution

## Status
Complete | In Progress | Blocked

quality_standards.completeness: All components in CLAUDE.md sprint tasks must be created
quality_standards.accuracy: No forbidden file violations, components in correct output_directory
quality_standards.format: TypeScript + React components following existing patterns in PromptingWorkflow/

coordination_protocol.forbidden_file_enforcement: CRITICAL - Agents must not modify files in their forbidden_files list. Orchestrator verifies via git diff.
coordination_protocol.parallel_safety: Creator writes to SessionCreation/, Monitor writes to SessionMonitoring/ - no file conflicts possible
coordination_protocol.integration_dependency: Integration agent BLOCKED until Creator + Monitor both report status = 'complete'
